adverse_events_resolution_logic.name: adverse_events_resolution_logic
adverse_events_resolution_logic.value: ("adverse_events"."adverse_event_outcome" = 'Resolved' AND "adverse_events"."resolved_at" IS NOT NULL) OR ("adverse_events"."adverse_event_outcome" != 'Resolved' AND "adverse_events"."resolved_at" IS NULL)

data_processing_details.name: data_processing_details
data_processing_details.default: 'Data will be processed for the purpose of clinical trial management and regulatory compliance'

gdpr_consents_withdrawal_logic.name: gdpr_consents_withdrawal_logic
gdpr_consents_withdrawal_logic.value: ("gdpr_consents"."consent_status" = 'Withdrawn' AND "gdpr_consents"."withdrawal_date" IS NOT NULL) OR ("gdpr_consents"."consent_status" != 'Withdrawn' AND "gdpr_consents"."withdrawal_date" IS NULL)

site_certifications_date_order.name: site_certifications_date_order
site_certifications_date_order.value: "site_certifications"."issued_date" IS NULL OR "site_certifications"."expiry_date" IS NULL OR "site_certifications"."issued_date" <= "site_certifications"."expiry_date"

address.name: address
address.default: '123 Default St, Default City, Default Country'

patients_enrollment_before_withdrawal.name: patients_enrollment_before_withdrawal
patients_enrollment_before_withdrawal.value: "patients"."enrollment_date" IS NULL OR "patients"."withdrawal_date" IS NULL OR "patients"."enrollment_date" <= "patients"."withdrawal_date"

vital_signs_bp_relationship.name: vital_signs_bp_relationship
vital_signs_bp_relationship.value: "vital_signs"."systolic_bp" IS NULL OR "vital_signs"."diastolic_bp" IS NULL OR "vital_signs"."systolic_bp" >= "vital_signs"."diastolic_bp"

regulatory_approvals_date_order.name: regulatory_approvals_date_order
regulatory_approvals_date_order.value: "regulatory_approvals"."approval_date" IS NULL OR "regulatory_approvals"."expiry_date" IS NULL OR "regulatory_approvals"."approval_date" <= "regulatory_approvals"."expiry_date"
